content: For Questionnaire.type, what is the difference between CHOICE vs OPEN-CHOICE? They are both drawn from a list of possible answers. Please clarify thanks.
With open-choice, instead of picking from the list of options, you can also just provide a string saying whatever you like.

Lloyd McKenzie said:

With open-choice, instead of picking from the list of options, you can also just provide a string saying whatever you like.

ah ok, thanks Lloyd !
